CheckBoxPreference.android:title: View Over Shoulder
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This setting controls third person view mode. False: View is centered on the character's head. Crosshair is hidden. True: In non-combat mode camera is positioned behind the character's shoulder. Crosshair is visible in third person mode as well.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto Switch Shoulder
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When player is close to an obstacle, automatically switches camera to the shoulder that is farther away from the obstacle.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Preview if Standing Still
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled then the character rotation is not synchonized with the camera rotation while the character doesn't move and not in combat mode.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Deferred Preview Rotation
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled then the character smoothly rotates to the view direction after exiting preview or vanity mode. If disabled then the camera rotates rather than the character.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Head Bobbing in 1st Person
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables head bobbing when move in first person mode.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hand Inertia
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Causes hands to chase view direction slightly when turning, instead of matching the camera perfectly.
